problemdescription.title: Alpha 1 - Add two more!
problemdescription.shortdescription: Write a function that sums four integers.
problemdescription.description: Fill out the given startr code: Given four integers a, b, c, and d, return the total sum.

input.name: Function return
input.description: The sum of the four given integers

problemdescription.startercode: def sum_function(a, b, c, d): # Write code here...
